instruction: Generate example sentences for the phrase: "never give up".
output:
1. No matter how hard the challenge is, never give up. 
2. Perseverance is key, so never give up on your dreams. 
3. Believe in yourself and remind yourself that you should never give up.
4. When times are tough, never give up and keep pushing forward.
5. No matter what happens, you must never give up on yourself. 
6. Keep trying, never give up and you'll eventually achieve success. 
7. Don't let fear and doubt hold you back – never give up. 
8. When you hit a wall, never give up – there's always a way forward. 
9. Failing is part of the process, but never give up on yourself. 
10. Through hard work and dedication, never give up on your goals.
